CheckTitle: Ensure a notification is configured for changes to route tables
Description: Event rules should be configured to notify on route table changes.
Risk: Without proper event monitoring, security-relevant changes may go unnoticed.

Code.Other:
1. Navigate to Observability & Management > Events Service
2. Create a new rule
3. Configure the event condition
4. Add notification action
5. Save the rule

Recommendation.Text: Ensure a notification is configured for changes to route tables
